title: Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1938–1939
medium:
Medium: silk, rayon, linen, cotton, wool, paper, cardboard
Technique: printed and woven
description: Sample book with red cotton cover printed in black: "Cruise and Resort Fabrics 1938 – 1939. Moss-Still Incorporated. 663 Fifth Avenue, New York City." Contains 258 samples: 9 nubbed silks, 97 novelty linens, 21 linen plain weave, 14 sheer linens, 29 printed linens, 6 linen fancy cloths, 8 linen plaids, 7 linen-and-silk novelties; 4 printed spun rayons, 8 wool-and-rayons, 42 novelty rayons, 8 printed rayons, 1 rayon-and-cotton, 2 printed cottons, 1 cotton piqué, and 1 cotton novelty.

tombstone.epitaph:
Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1938–1939.
1938–1939. Medium: silk, rayon, linen, cotton, wool, paper, cardboard
Technique: printed and woven. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-5.
